titles: The Whig rampant: or, Exaltation. Being a pleasant new song of 82. To a new tune of, Hey boys up go we.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publisher: printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in West Smithfield.,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Now now the Tories all shall stoop ..."
An expanded edition of: The Whig's exaltation.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
